headline: Ask HN: What's the Color of Your Dreams?
description:
This article stated that only 12% people claimed their dreams were in black and white only. But this number of 12% seems too small, so I'd like to check with everyone here whether it's a reasonable conclusion.

https://www.verywellmind.com/facts-about-dreams-2795938#:~:text=Not%20All%20Dreams%20Are%20in,are%20those%20most%20frequently%20chosen.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你梦想的颜色是什么？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你夢想的顏色是什麼？
description_zh-Hans:
这篇文章说，只有12%的人声称他们的梦只有黑白两色。但是这个12%的数字似乎太小了，所以我想在这里和大家核对一下这个结论是否合理。

https://www.verywellmind.com/facts-about-dreams-2795938#:~:text=Not%20Dreams%20Are%20in,are%20those%20most%20frequently%20chosen。
description_zh-Hant:
這篇文章說，只有12%的人聲稱他們的夢只有黑白兩色。但是這個12%的數字似乎太小了，所以我想在這裡和大家核對一下這個結論是否合理。

https://www.verywellmind.com/facts-about-dreams-2795938#:~:text=Not%20Dreams%20Are%20in,are%20those%20most%20frequently%20chosen。
